name: medooze-audio-codecs
description: Audio codecs for Media and RTMP servers

scripts.package: npm run prepare && tar cvzf build/medooze-audio-codecs.tgz  `([ "$(uname)" = 'Darwin' ] && echo "-s |^|medooze-audio-codecs/|") || echo " --transform=flags=r;s|^|medooze-audio-codecs/|"` media-server/src/* media-server/include/* media-server/ext/libdatachannels/src/* media-server/ext/crc32c/* lib/* package.json index.js index.d.ts build/types  binding.gyp  README.md src
scripts.dist: npm run configure && npm run build && npm run prepare && mkdir -p dist && tar cvzf dist/medooze-audio-codecs-`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`.tgz `([ "$(uname)" = 'Darwin' ] && echo "-s |^|medooze-audio-codecs/|") || echo " --transform=flags=r;s|^|medooze-audio-codecs/|"` package.json index.js index.d.ts build/types  README.md lib/* build/Release/medooze-audio-codecs.node

author: Sergio Garcia Murillo @ Medooze
